hero.title: Party Roamer Photobooth
hero.subTitle: Take your event to the next level
hero.text: Your guest wont need to go to the photobooth - it will come to them!

home.intro: A photo booth is the perfect, fun addition to any event or party you are planning.
home.subIntro: Our Roaming Photo Booth will make a lasting impression at any event you are hosting, and will add a personal touch that will impress your guests. Show people the amazing time that can be had in a new, interactive way of photo booth experiences.

product.title: More than a Photobooth
product.modern: More inviting, modern and attractive than traditional style
product.body: Also known as an open-air photo booth or selfie station, roaming booths have become more popular because they often have an interactive screen for participants, can deliver photos digitally, fit more people in the photos, have more options for software, and are generally more inviting, modern, and attractive than the traditional style.

event.title: PERFECT FOR ANY EVENT!
event.body: Roaming photo booths have been a huge trend when it comes to adding interactive fun at events. At Party Roamer, we`ve taken a different approach to maintain a high level of quality but still providing a mobile solution for any type of events

corporate.title: Corporate Events
corporate.body: We love working with corporate companies to deliver engaging and sharable experiences. We can increase your brand awareness by over 120%

private.title: Weddings Events
private.body: Our photo booth is perfect for capturing all the unforgettable moments. Adding an exicting activity for your guess

holiday.title: Private Events
holiday.body: Renting a photo booth for your next holiday party creates lasting cheerful memories. We can make your holiday event exciting and memorable
